snippet: The judge in the Colorado theater shooting case has denied a defense request for a special prosecutor to look into a news story about defendant James Holmes....

headline.print_headline: Judge Denies Special Prosecutor Request in Rampage
headline.main: Judge Denies Special Prosecutor Request in Rampage

lead_paragraph: The judge in the Colorado theater shooting case has denied a defense request for a special prosecutor to look into a news story about defendant James Holmes.
